trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Littleton
There were no other sightings in Littleton on or around January 17th 2009
Summary: A light appeared in the sky becoming very bright and headed north with incredible speed.
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a light appearing in the sky, first like a star but becoming over-sudden very bright, for about two seconds stationary and then it headed north with an incredible speed and disappeared. I am a German sea captain and spent plenty of years around the world at sea. I have never seen something like that before.
